outcome: Military regime enacts stringent controls to regain order, amplifying unrest among citizens.

events.description: The military imposes a city-wide curfew in response to escalating protests, citing the need to restore public order.
A secret meeting among high-ranking military officials discusses increasing control over the BCI system to stabilize Stenograd.
Social media captures instances of excessive force used by military personnel, leading to public outcry and calls for accountability.
Unexpected power outages occur across the city as the BCI struggles to operate under heightened security constraints, affecting daily life.
